article.description: Rob Edwards scored 17 and Andre Yates added 13 points to help Cleveland State beat Rider 57-52 Tuesday.
article.headline: Edwards scores 17, Cleveland State beats Rider 57-52
article.linkText: Edwards scores 17, Cleveland State beats Rider 57-52
article.story: CANCUN, Mexico -- Rob Edwards scored 17 and Andre Yates added 13 points to help Cleveland State beat Rider 57-52 Tuesday. Daniel Levitt scored 11 points for Cleveland State (2-2), which overcame a poor shooting performance in the first-ever meeting between the programs. Back-to-back layups by Xavier Lundy and Jimmie Taylor trimmed Rider's deficit to 53-52 with 1:05 to play. Edwards made 1 of 2 free throws and, after Lundy missed a jumper on the other end, Demonte Flannigan hit a pair from the stripe to make it 56-52 with 12 seconds to go. Derek Sloan then had a steal and Edwards made the first of two free throws to cap the scoring. Rider (0-4) made 18 of 38 (47.4 percent) field goals -- while Cleveland State shot just 34 percent from the field -- but made just 14 of 25 free throws. The Vikings were 23-of-32 from the free-throw line.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
